Title:
Notes on the powdery mildews (Erysiphales) in Japan II.
Erysiphe sect. Microsphaera
Keywords:
Erysiphaceae, Molecular phylogeny, Morphology, New host,
Pseudoidium
Abstract:
First record of teleomorph of Erysiphe platani on Platanus
x acerifolia is reported in Japan. First morphological record of E.
viburni on Viburnum sieboldii var. obovatifolium, and first
morphological record and molecular data for E. wallrothii on LeucothoÃ«
grayana and Pseudoidium hortensiae on Hydrangea serrata var. megacarpa
are presented in this paper.
